- tool name: command_executor
- args: {
  "tshark_command": "-Y \"http.request.method == \\\"POST\\\" && tcp.port == 8080\" -T fields -e http.file_data"
}

- tool name: final_answer_formatter
- args: {
  "report": "The payloads of the POST requests on port 8080 were successfully re-extracted using the specified tshark command.   "executed_command": "-Y \"http.request.method == \\\"POST\\\" && tcp.port == 8080\" -T fields -e http.file_data"
}

---

Final report from the forensic expert:
The payloads of the POST requests on port 8080 were successfully re-extracted using the specified tshark command. The command filtered for HTTP POST requests on port 8080 and extracted the payload data in hexadecimal format, which can be converted to a human-readable format if necessary.
Executed command: -Y "http.request.method == \"POST\" && tcp.port == 8080" -T fields -e http.file_data
